website_summaries.verdict: A deck scrub brush that features stiff but yielding bristles, making it safe for use on gelcoat, fiberglass, and painted surfaces.
pros: This model comes with a 4-foot wooden handle and is manufactured to withstand most solvents, acids, and alkalis
The split-end design allows individual bristles to hold plenty of soap and water, streamlining work
cons: At just 6 inches wide, the head is a little smaller than other deck scrub brushes
However, this can be useful for cleaning tight locations

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub brush and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in both knees and my lower back so this works great for scrubbing the bottom of my tub with a bit of borax. The bristles weren't as stiff as I hoped they would be but it works just great. I love it because the bristle head is smaller than others you see in the store so it fits better in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Calicotabby72

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality deck brush. Compared to west marine who charges astronomical prices for shurhold products this is a great value. Brush and handle combo feels top notch and has a nice durable finish.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSteve

customer_reviews.title: Great deck brush safe for gelcoat
customer_reviews.text: Really a great deck brush. I had some trouble determining exactly what stiffness the brush was - I believe it is "soft" although it is still plenty stiff to clean my boat's deck easily without damaging the gelcoat. Did not experience the shedding of bristles that some folks complained of.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good brush BUT doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good brush... Used it for the last two years but now the bristles have become imbrittled and snap into little pieces. It has become completely useless. I only use household chemicals, so nothing too strong. Disappointing that this has happened.
customer_reviews.author: angulas

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Only three because the threads on the handle itself were practically non existent. Still screwed in though with what was barely there.
customer_reviews.author: The Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Used this to scrub the deck of our pontoon boat. Worked well. Sturdy, well constructed. Seems like it will likely last many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Great quality brush. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because it's somewhat difficult to put together the handle to the brush and insert into the base. Still works great as described and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Soft is soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought a soft bristle scrub brush for bathroom and floors, based on some of the reviews. If you want it for floors do not get the soft. The soft is practically useless for floors. It would be great for a car, not floors.
customer_reviews.author: Staytooned

customer_reviews.title: Using on tile floor & happy
customer_reviews.text: Idea, doing it's job. I went with soft for my tile, I expected some bristles to fray because of using it on tile, not damaging the floor. Still Happy, worth the money will buy again when this one goes bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nawnie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Shurhold makes a quality brush. This comes in 3 different bristles - soft, medium, stiff. Nice quality brush. Soft bristles soft enough for powder coated surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning pole/brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a wooden pole with the brush screwed on. It is perfect for cleaning our deck boat and easily stored underneath. Very sturdy and the brush is hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft brush better for bathtub.
customer_reviews.text: The stiff bristles are overkill for my bathtub. Soft bristles would have been fine. I can’t screw the handle all the way in to the brush head. The threads show a little, but it’s still sturdy when I’m scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Marbles

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning gel coated fiberglass
customer_reviews.text: Soft ended bristles, but still firm, to make jel coated fiberglass cleaning easy, with no scratches. No need to get down on my knees anymore.
customer_reviews.author: salc00

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush for my boat just opened it out of box an it looks like it’s been used for a long time looks dirty an worn all ready (never used)
customer_reviews.author: LOU

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse on a boat
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable yet soft bristle brush that I use in our boat. It would work well in cleaning the outside as well as cleaning the final boat seats. I have found that using a soft brush like this with good cleaner is the key to success in really cleaning the boat seat vinyl well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Probably too soft to actually clean a dirty tub
customer_reviews.text: Wood handle had a bad large splinter. Had to cut out the loose splinter with a razor knife.
customer_reviews.author: Camaro lover

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased to clean our motorhome. Well made and cleans very well. We hang it upside down on a command broom hook to protect bristols from taking a weird shape.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush to wash the boat after a great day on the water. Scrub dirt and grime with ease. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for cleaning. Love that it's made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: nicole eger

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last but a couple years of light use and it’s falling apart bristles are coming out.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after loosing the last one overboard... Good thing this is 10x better then the last. We use this daily on a commercial fishing vessel
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for boat decks.
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a true stiff bristle brush to scrub my fishing boat textured floor. This thing did the trick. Works great for hard to remove dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W. Burgin

customer_reviews.title: This product does a good job of cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are strong enough to remove dirt and other stains from our dock surface and yet still not destroy the dock surface. This is a well made product that does not require a great deal of effort to get it to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: Essential for a boater
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat these brushes. Just NOTE: this comes with a handle and wont screw on to your extension pole. I use the brush for the boat scum line and it gets the job done without scratching the finish or striping.
customer_reviews.author: AlmostEverything84Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I puchased this thinking it would have been bigger but purchased the wrong size. It could be better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk, after one year on my boat the bristles disintegrated into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chris Dyball

customer_reviews.title: stiff bristles good for boat deck
customer_reviews.text: very stiff. great for scrubbing the deck but kinda too hard for angled and vertical surfaces. Its a very well made brush and will last me forever
customer_reviews.author: otbrenner

customer_reviews.title: Brush head good, handle garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The brush head is great, but the handle was cracked in half long ways when pulled out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, good value. It scrubbed the boat deck as intended without any issues. Had to get down and scrub with a hand brush in some tougher areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No handle shipped
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped without the handle... kind of a letdown
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush was exactly what I needed. Has a lot more bristles than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: RubenR

customer_reviews.title: Great for scrubbing a walk-in shower. Saves a lot of time over using a hand brush or sponge.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brush for cleaning a large, walk-in shower. Bristles are very stiff as I hoped they would be. Top quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good for light gentle cleaning but not for hard cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a little too long and flimsy. Good for light gentle cleaning but not for hard cleaning jobs.
customer_reviews.author: norakat

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Use it on our deck and it works perfect. Wonderful bend to brush , drys quickly, stores easy.
customer_reviews.author: Betty K

customer_reviews.title: 'New'??
customer_reviews.text: When you order something 'new', you expect to receive it in new condition. The product is not damaged in any manner, but the bright yellow bristles are dark/dirt colored on the ends. I ordered this as a father's day gift...how tacky to give a gift that appears to be used! Hopefully it works well.
customer_reviews.author: fek1419

customer_reviews.title: Quaity product!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best brushes out there. Don't settle for cheap imitations that may damage your pride and joy. They are a waste of money. You'll wish you had bought a Shurhold to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Sester

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best brushes out there. Don't settle for cheap imitations that may damage pride and joy. Buy the best and be done with it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Sester

customer_reviews.title: Great cost effective alternative to other brushes.
customer_reviews.text: Made cleaning the boat and truck a much quicker task, build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie4Life

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good brush but small for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The brush head seems to be solid and should be effective; the head is smaller than I thought it would be - measures about 7" across. The handle is warped in a pretty bad arc, almost to the point of being useless. Not sending it back for the handle because a standard paint roller pole will fit the threads on the head and I have a few of those in the garage. I have yet to use the brush on the boat, the three star rating is based on what I received in the mail today.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Best Boat wash brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is the handiest brush I have ever used! I have used the brushes with the swivel head that were not bad but they break easily and swivel just when you don't want them to. On this one the head stays put but the curve of the soft bristles are just right to get to all of the tight places on the boat and my other vehicles. It is very well made and I expect to be using this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Angie J. Lampley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cleaning Docks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean my docks rather than a boat. Works great. Just the right stiffness and handle length.
customer_reviews.author: MarkTGT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brush! You get what you pay for, and this is a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Truly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement as the first pole had a large split in it. This one has blue pen on the handle. I would not but from this supplier again. Truly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joel

product_meta.title: Shurhold 1950 Marine Mate Stiff Brush with Handle
product_meta.description: Style:StiffThis abrasive 6 inch (15 cm) stiff brush includes a 48 inch (122 cm) threaded wood handle. The strong bristles are strong enough to withstand most solvents, acids and alkalis. It's great for scrubbing teak and below the water line. This mop and handle come as one piece, so it is not compatible with Shurhold handles.
feature_bullets: Strong bristles withstand most solvents, acids and alkalis
Great for scrubbing teak and below the water line
Mop and handle come as one piece

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars246 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
